content.question: Which of the following correctly identifies the sequence of energy conversions that occur in a wind turbine?

choices.label: Mechanical energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> kinetic energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> electrical energy

Potential energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> mechanical energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> kinetic energy

Kinetic energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> mechanical energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> electrical energy

Potential energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> electrical energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> mechanical energy

content.answer: Kinetic energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> mechanical energy <math alttext="to" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>→</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> electrical energy
